content: Shame on you! After all those bad reviews and emails from paying customers such as myself you have done nothing since August 2019 to fix the sound problem. It's 2021. My kid loves this app. It's awesome for when he doesn't want to go to sleep... I put him down with the video and after all the animals are sleeping he simply says good night, turns around and falls asleep.
I noticed that if you look at the snakes body it has splatters of blood on him
My animal purchases wont load. Please fix
so beautiful!!! Just wondering if i have to pay for each nrw device i want this on?
Calming voices, beautiful muted colors and a fun walk through that helps my 2 year old settle for naps and nighttime. No glitches or issues on an XL2
Beautiful, really relaxing, really well made and worth every penny.

May 2017: Like quite a few other reviewers here, I still can't reload 
animal purchases. Such a shame, my kids were rather fond of this game. 
Uninstalling until the issue is fixed. July 2018: got a new phone, so I 
thought I'd give this another go. Same problem again - I had paid for the 
additional animals way back in February 2016, and when I try to reload 
purchases, nothing happens. I was going to get the forest version as well, 
but if this still hasn't been resolved, I don't think I'll bother.

Adorable and working well for my kids. My two year old gets a bit too 
excited to sleep if I use the manual mode, but at least he goes to bed 
without complaining now. Auto mode is better to get him actually sleepy and 
I usually switch to one of the other two stories for that. Anyway, keep up 
the great work!

Like other Fox &Sheep apps, this is a brilliant app! My son and I are big 
fans of their "nighty night" series: an evening routine, with a beginning, 
a calm story development, and a closure to go to sleep. And I can alternate 
the farm version, the circus version, the forest one (see other apps of the 
series)....we love it!
My son loves it, only problem is you can't limit the number of animals, so you always have to sleep them all and with a sleepy kid that can take some time. It'd be a nice enhancement
2 year old who never stops running will always sit down for this

As usual with the extremely underrated Fox & Sheep, an absolutely fantastic app that's worth 50 times the price. These fickle cheapskate tightwad 1 star reviewers are the type that would complain and whine about winning a brand new Corvette because it came with an empty gas tank. You will NOT find better bedtime, non-book, apps for kids anywhere on Android.
It's a great app, but it doesn't fit the screen on the pixel XL 2
Can't reload animal purchase either. Tried on several devices and nothing.
My baby loves this!
This a very lovely made app. My daughter loves it and really falls asleep when done. Still searching for something similar but besides nighty night farmhouse i did not find anything comparable.
My kids, 5 and 3 years old, just LOVE this app. The drawings are perfect, the sounds soothing and the narrator's voice incredible. What else?

content: Thank you to the Fox & Sheep team for responding to my email and correcting the glitch on my Samsung S7. My toddler loves this app, and it has been a part of his nighttime routine just about his whole life.

content: The bug is finally fixed!!! 5 stars from us.

This one gets the little ones wound up, whereas the original one wins them down. Still cute, but too similar to need them both.

my 2year old & I both luv & enjoy this app. We have the other nighty night app as well which we also luv but he & I both enjoy this 1 more the animals are much more entertaining & fun¬†having more things to do or interact w/in the rooms would be nice but even so we still love it i just wish there¬† were multiple animal packs you could buy, the only complaint i do have is just the placement of some of the light switches are to close to the back button so instead of hitting the lightswitch hell hit back buton

My 13 mo old loves this one more than the other Nighty Night app. He laughs & smiles at the silly circus animals. I think this one is better than the other app as well.
As much fun as nighty, night...added to our bedtime routine

Works all the time and my 3yr old loves it

Lovely little game for toddlers but time after time when you press the arrow to return to the circus the screen goes black. This is a real frustration for parents and toddlers and as a result I've had to get a refund and uninstall the app.

Love this app! Paid for all the extras too. Unfortunately, first day I had it, it blacked out every time we played and did it every time my kids tried to push the arrow back out of the animal rooms.  After some experiments, looks like the back arrow can only be pushed once and all runs smooth.  Try telling your 2 year old to only push once. :) ha!
